prod_short_desc: Prepare for battle at The Desert Outpost!
prod_long_desc:
Hostile mobs are spawning like never before, and the desert is becoming a very scary place to be… it’s time to build The Desert Outpost! Help Alex construct the house and lookout tower, build a protective wall and ring the fortress with burning torches. Have the tame wolf stand guard while you craft a bed, table, door, ladder and a boat, then sail out in search of crops to farm within the outpost walls. As darkness falls, silhouettes of approaching skeletons appear on the desert horizon. Grab your weapons, load up the TNT launcher, and prepare for battle! Rebuild the set for more LEGO® Minecraft™ creations! Includes 2 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessories: Steve and Alex, plus a wolf and 2 skeletons.
Includes 2 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessories: Steve and Alex, plus a wolf and 2 skeletons
Features a fortress with house and lookout tower, TNT launch and explode function, buildable boat, crafting table, door, ladder, 4 buildable torches, buildable redstone torch, buildable cactus and wheat and sugar cane elements
House features an opening door and removable roof for access to the interior
Weapon elements include a sword, 2 skeleton bows and a pickaxe
Accessory elements include skeleton’s armor
Set your imagination free!
Experience The Desert Outpost
Sail out in search of supplies!
Launch the TNT to defeat the skeleton army!
The perfect gift for fans of LEGO building and Minecraft
Rebuild for more LEGO Minecraft creations
Measures 4” high, 10” wide and 13” long
Combine this biome with others in the series to create your own LEGO Minecraft world
